JBNCK's app collection

This is a repository of apps I use on a daily basis that are not available on F-Droid. Note that some apps are not open source.

Currently it serves 15 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://www.janbiernacik.com/apps/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
97 FB 0C 21 35 A0 2F EF 62 D9 32 19 E4 61 7E D5 CA 25 3C FE 87 DE 77 0F 06 73 7C CD 5C D2 2F E2
